description: An African Millionaire was first published in 1897 by Grant Allen. The narrator of this novel, Seymour Wilbraham Wentworth, is the brother-in-law and secretary to Sir Charles Vandrift, a South African millionaire and famous financier. This book includes twelve short stories that follow these two men and their adventures together. Read about the many attempts to swindle them in the following collection: The Episode of the Mexican Seer, Diamond Links, Old Master, Tyrolean Castle, Drawn Game, German Professor, Arrest of the Colonel, Seldon Gold-Mine, Japanned Dispatch-Box, Game of Poker, Bertillon Method, and Old Bailey. To have access to this classic masterpiece download our ebook today!
